alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued November 05 at 9:26PM CST until November 06 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...POTENTIALLY CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS SUNDAY AFTERNOON... .Low relative humidity, strong westerly wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph, and dry fuels will be favorable for rapid fire growth Sunday afternoon across portions of northern Minnesota. The humidity has the potential to be even lower than currently forecast. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin, South Aitkin, Carlton and South St. Louis and Pine. * WINDS...West 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 29 percent. * IMPACTS...These conditions are supportive of rapid fire growth.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin; South Cass
